effect.sun_moon: Only usable if the user is sleeping. Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Only usable if the user is sleeping. Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

short_effect.sun_moon: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Only works if the user is sleeping.

short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Only works if the user is sleeping.

flavor_text.sun_moon: This attack can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.
